name: 30 Seconds To Get To University!
description:
30 Seconds To Get To University, is an accurate recreation of the life of the struggles of a first-year university student, waking up late to their classes and in a rush to gather their things and make it to class on time. 

This game was design for educational purposes only. 

How to extract:

Download the game. 

Extract the game to an easy-to-find location. 

Open game file 

Read the 'READ ME.txt' within the files.

Run 'CIC Assessment.exe' application. 

Enjoy!
